alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:59AM CDT until April 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LOUISA...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gladwin, or 10 miles northwest of Columbus Junction, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Liberty, Lone Tree, Ainsworth, Conesville, Nichols, Atalissa, Cotter, Muscatine County Fairgrounds, Marr Park, Haskins, Saulsbury Bridge Campground, River Junction and Gladwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
